action: For starting the game and completing the first activity!
message: It's always good to get the right start at a new challenge. You just did that. Now, on to victory!

action: For making a correct diagnosis of Severe Malaria
message: Excellent!. Severe Malaria is life threatening and proper diagnosis and treatment avoids unfortunate complications. Lucky Kid! He's in very capable hands.
Wow! Like a sniper in an action movie, you kept a calm head, took aim at Severe Malaria and took it out, with three precise actions! Today, you saved a life.

action: For being respectful to your patients
message: Aha... It's such a relief for patients when they are attended to by a competent and respectful nurse. Thanks to you, the world will be a much better place for patients. KEEP IT UP!

action: For taking no risks when diagnosing your patients
message: Great Job. You take no risk with diagnosing your patients. Continue being prudent, as a nurse can never be too cautious when arriving at a diagnosis. Kudos!

Congratulations! You've proven yourself a very competent and trustworthy nurse. Being dedicated and hardworking can also lead to lot's opportunities for professional growth. Continue being an awesome nurse.

action: For making a correct diagnosis of Treatment Failure
message: Yes! Failure is never a part of your nature even what you are attempting to diagnose is Treatment Failure. Great catch noticing that a patient's treatment may have failed. Good job!
We knew you wouldn't disappoint us. You can now treat pregnant women when they come to the clinic. Good job!

action: For correctly diagnosing and treating Malaria in Pregnancy
message: Excellent! You're great at diagnosing and treating Malaria in Pregnancy, recognizing the difference treatment options available at the different stages of pregnancy. For this we dub you a Malaria in Pregnancy (MIP) Superstar. Well Done!

action: For completing the Health Facility Scenario
message: CONGRATULATIONS Nurse! You deserve this, go celebrate your hardwork!
